name: Old National Bancorp
description: Old National Bancorp is a diversified financial services company headquartered in Evansville, Indiana. Founded in 1834, it has grown to become one of the largest bank holding companies in the Midwest, offering a wide range of banking, investment, and insurance services. The company operates through its banking subsidiary, Old National Bank, which serves retail and commercial customers in Indiana, Kentucky, Illinois, and Wisconsin. Old National is committed to providing personalized banking services that help individuals and businesses achieve their financial goals. The company emphasizes community involvement and responsible banking practices, offering a variety of products such as checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and wealth management solutions. Old National Bancorp is recognized for its strong corporate governance and commitment to sustainability, striving to make a positive impact on the communities it serves. The company is also focused on enhancing customer experience through digital banking innovations and personalized financial advice. With a legacy of over 180 years, Old National Bancorp continues to build on its strong foundation by adapting to the changing financial landscape while maintaining its core values of integrity, respect, and excellence.

seo.meta_title: Old National Bancorp | Comprehensive Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Old National Bancorp, a leader in financial services offering banking, investment, and insurance solutions. Discover how we support our communities and customers.

faq.question: What services does Old National Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Old National Bancorp offers a range of services including banking, investment management, and insurance.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Old National Bancorp?
faq.answer: Jim Ryan is the CEO of Old National Bancorp.

faq.question: Where is Old National Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Old National Bancorp is headquartered in Evansville, Indiana, USA.

faq.question: When was Old National Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Old National Bancorp was founded in 1834.
